title: Questions From the ‘WandaVision’ Finale. Plus, ‘The Investigation’ and ‘Beartown.’
description:
Chris and Andy talk about ‘The Investigation’ and ‘Beartown,’ two Scandinavian TV shows they’re currently liking (2:34). Then, they try to answer some of the remaining questions after the ‘WandaVision’ finale, including who the show’s final villain was (18:53) and where the Marvel universe will go from here (41:16).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
